title: Adults-Only Boutique Rarotonga Escape with 60-Minute Couples' Massage & Gourmet Breakfast Hamper
description: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of Rarotonga with a relaxing stay at the Ocean Escape Resort & Spa. Discover a tropical Cook Islands paradise of sparkling turquoise waters, densely forested landscapes dotted with jagged volcanic peaks and pristine beaches. This beachfront, eco-friendly, adults-only oasis (16+) is a haven for sun-soaked days and serenity, perfect for romantic escapes. Located near the spectacular Muri Beach, this is the ideal opportunity to practice your snorkelling and diving skills amongst exhilarating marine life. Dive into the resort's fresh ocean lagoon pool complete with a coral reef - the only one of its kind on Rarotonga - enjoy the onsite Essential Spa, relax on your private balcony or step straight onto the beach from the resort and wander along the sandy shores to watch the sun rise over the ocean. If you’re lucky, you may even catch whales migrating just a short distance from the beach at certain times of the year.
offer_address: 1 Ara Tapu, Turangi Village, Arong District, Rarotonga, 3385, Cook Islands

title: Five-Star Private Villa Escape with Massages at Award-Winning Spa
description:
Set off for the splendour of the South Pacific with a romantic couples’ escape at the five-star Rumours Luxury Villas and Spa. Set on two absolute beachfront locations, just steps from the gorgeous white sands of Muri Beach and its crystal-clear lagoon, this luxurious resort - ranked #1 in the area on TripAdvisor and offering a truly world-class experience - is what dreams are made of.

Unwind in the luxury of your very own private villa complete with an impressive pool surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Luxuriate in two 60-minute massages at the award-winning Waterfall Spa, and enjoy a delicious platter delivered to you every morning for a romantic in-villa breakfast. The VIP treatment comes complete with a welcome hamper of wine and nibbles on arrival, a grazing platter for your first evening meal, and return airport transfers.
offer_address: Ara Tapu, Ngatangiia District, Cook Islands

title: Intimate Adults-Only Cook Islands Getaway
description: Set off for the splendour of the South Pacific with a five or seven-night romantic couples' escape at the award-winning, adults-only Little Polynesian Resort - perched on a private beach in the south of Rarotonga, Cook Islands. Bliss out in a Beachfront Bungalow and enjoy indulgent extras like daily a la carte tropical breakfasts, a NZ$150 food and beverage credit, nightly cocktails for two, a bottle of wine on arrival and more.
offer_address: Main Road - Titikaveka, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Cook Islands Beachfront Escape with Two Salt Water Pools, Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description: Nestled among coconut palms and boasting white sandy beaches and lush tropical gardens, Sunset Resort Rarotonga has everything you need to relax in Raratonga, the largest of the Cook Islands. Savour a tropical breakfast at Anchorage Restaurant and Bar, sip on a fresh cocktail while you sit poolside at The Birdcage Bar and snorkel in the crystal clear lagoon - all without leaving the resort. Spend the day snorkelling alongside diverse marine life or take in the stunning Rarotongan sunset from one of two outdoor salt-water swimming pools. At the end of each day, come back to the privacy of your very own self-contained studio, fully equipped for your every need. Whatever your ideal island escape, Sunset Resort Rarotonga has got you covered for your next getaway.
offer_address: Ara Tapu, Arorangi, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Cook Islands: Beachfront Serenity in Rarotonga
description: Leave it all behind for the secluded beauty of Rarotonga, where aquamarine lagoon waters lap powder-white sands and volcanic green peaks skim the clouds. Stay on one of the island’s most pristine beaches at Royale Takitumu, an 18+ adults-only resort featuring just ten exclusive thatched villas set amid fragrant tropical gardens. Your stay includes a complimentary breakfast basket, a welcome drink on arrival, return airport transfers, a bottle of wine, a NZ$100 Wi-Fi credit and complimentary use of snorkelling gear, kayaks, SUPs and e-bikes.

title: Cook Islands Idyllic Rarotonga Suites with Daily Breakfast & Daily NZ$100 Resort Credit
description:
From aquamarine waters, powder-white sands and volcanic green peaks skimming the clouds, the Cook Islands are an idyllic paradise - and a blissful stay at Pacific Resort Rarotonga might just be the escape of your dreams. The resort’s location on the edge of picture-perfect Muri Beach is nothing short of exceptional, and this relaxing hideaway lends itself to lazy days spent by the sparkling pool or embracing your active side to exploring the nearby coral reefs teeming with multi-coloured marine life.

Beyond the resort, there is no shortage of ways to fill your days. Rarotonga is an oasis where sandy white beaches, lush rainforest, coastal lagoons and scenic reefs are all just waiting to be discovered, and getting around the island is as easy as travelling clockwise, or anti-clockwise, in a rental car or scooter and traversing the whole island in as little as 45 minutes. Choose to trek along the verdant trails that zig-zag across the island, hail the hop-on, hop-off bus that travels around the island, take a day trip to Aitutaki or visit the famous Muri Night Markets. When you're ready to put your feet up for the day, stroll on over to Sandals Restaurant for dishes inspired by the Pacific Rim, or Barefoot Bar for refreshing cocktails and a selection of local and international drinks.
offer_address: Muri Beach, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

description:

Get ready for the trip of a lifetime on this island paradise with daily tropical breakfast, NZ$500 credit towards food and drinks, a bottle of wine on arrival, complimentary resort activities and complimentary use of kayaks, snorkelling equipment and stand-up paddleboards, beach towels and reserved sun loungers by the beach.

title: Rarotonga Adults-Only Beachfront Bliss with Daily Cocktails & NZ$150 Dining Credit
description:
Unwind and soak up the unspoiled beauty and traditional soul of the Cook Islands with a stay at the award-winning Little Polynesian Resort, a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World community. Set amid the secluded beauty of postcard-perfect Rarotonga, escape the ordinary to find your own slice of Polynesian paradise where aquamarine lagoon waters lap powder-white sands and volcanic green peaks skim the clouds.

Enjoy world-class facilities, including an infinity pool with elegant lounge chairs and umbrellas, a beach with stunning white sand, a resort bar for refreshments and a restaurant offering traditional Polynesian and modern European fare together with spectacular views over Titikaveka lagoon.

**Your handpicked inclusions**:

- Daily tropical breakfast, served at the beachfront restaurant with pool and lagoon views
- NZ$150 food and drink credit to be used at Little Polynesian Restaurant and Bar, where you can feast on traditional island cuisine and Pacific delights
- One daily ‘cocktail of the day’ per person - celebrate your escape with an espresso martini, limoncello sour and more
- A complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- 4GB Wi-Fi credit, so you can stay connected throughout your escape

offer_address: Main Road Titikaveka, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Cook Islands Award-Winning Adults-Only Beachfront Bungalow Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the unspoiled beauty and traditional soul of the Cook Islands with a stay at this award-winning, adults-only resort, a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World community.

Set in the postcard-perfect Rarotonga, escape the ordinary to find your slice of Polynesian paradise with just steps between you and the South Pacific's azure waters, coral cays, spectacular sunsets and soft, white sands.

Look out onto the Titikaveka lagoon while dining poolside at the onsite Little Polynesian Restaurant and Bar, savouring flavours of the tropics and sipping tiki tipples. Swim laps of the glistening infinity pool, paddle through the crystalline waters in a kayak or test your balance on a paddleboard.

Just a short walk along the beach will take you to the Fruits of Rarotonga, one of the island's best snorkelling spots, with butterflyfish, parrotfish, moray eels and turtles  aplenty. Honeymooners and couples: look no further; your romantic, private and luxurious escape awaits.
offer_address: Main Road Titikaveka, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Adults-Only Cook Islands Beachfront Retreat with NZ$200 Resort Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
The western side of Rarotonga holds a secret - the spectacular adults-only Crown Beach Resort & Spa, ideally positioned to catch the gorgeous sunset scenery every night. This sun-soaked beachfront escape is set within five acres of gardens and offers everything you could need for an indulgent island retreat. Take a dip in the waterfall swimming pool, and enjoy the convenience of a supermarket, general store, bakery and liquor store just across the road. Come the evening, pull up a chair at Oceans Restaurant & Bar, a waterfront venue serving up fresh, local produce.  At the outdoor bar, order a cocktail or a flute of bubbly and watch a spectacular sunset dip below the horizon.

Explore the island with ease - the resort is conveniently positioned a short drive from downtown Avarua. Take the opportunity to hire kayaks and snorkelling equipment and hit the ocean or lagoon for a fun-filled afternoon, or rent a bicycle and explore the island. After a long day of exploring, pamper yourself a treatment at the resort’s Spa Ariki, the perfect way to round the day in paradise.
offer_address: Arorangi Sunset Coast Beach Road Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Exclusive Cook Islands Beachfront Private Villa Complex for 8 Guests with One-Way Airport Transfer
description:
Discover bungalow-style luxury at this exquisite villa complex, where private resort living meets the balmy shores of the Cook Islands. Welcome to Waterfoot House, a four-suite private villa that offers unparalleled privacy and comfort, creating the perfect sanctuary with the elegance of a standalone estate.

Nestled within lush tropical gardens, the villa complex is all yours, with no shared spaces and no other guests. Open-plan living spaces invite you to relax, dine and unwind in style, while offering the privacy of four ensuite bedrooms. Enjoy a stunning 20-metre beachfront lap pool, a spacious BBQ pavilion and breezy poolside dining areas all to yourself - ideal for laid-back afternoons or hosting unforgettable evenings.

Whether you’re strolling along the beach, diving into the vibrant lagoon or exploring the island on a booked tour, everything you need for a luxurious Cook Islands escape is at your doorstep.

title: Secluded Cook Islands Family Escape on Secluded Aroa Beach
description:
Dive into island adventure and romance at The Rarotongan Beach Resort & Lagoonarium, a beachfront escape set on the shores of Aroa Lagoon. Perfect for couples and families alike, the resort offers unforgettable guided night snorkelling tours through its vibrant marine sanctuary. By day, enjoy The Rarotongan’s extensive free daily activities, stand-up paddleboarding, kayaking and more await just steps from your suite. 

Families will love the interconnecting accommodation options, while couples can sip sunset cocktails or plan a dream beach wedding with the help of a dedicated personal wedding planner. Whether you're basking on the sand, unwinding with a spa massage or dining beachside at Captain Andy’s, this tropical haven offers the ultimate Cook Islands experience.

Enjoy days in the sun, whether snorkelling and kayaking in the crystal clear Muri Lagoon or reclining on the deck, gazing upon Rarotonga's warm sands with a cocktail in hand. The only ECO-resort operation in the Cook Islands, this retreat is one of a kind. Dip in the swimming pool nestled between palm trees, and enjoy the sandy beaches of Muri Beach.

offer_address: Aroa Tapere, Arorangi District, Cook Islands

title: Brand-New Cook Islands Barefoot Luxury Villas with Rarotonga's Only Fresh Ocean Lagoon Pool
description:
Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of Rarotonga with a relaxing stay at the newly opened Ocean Escape Resort & Spa. Discover a tropical Cook Islands paradise of sparkling turquoise waters, densely forested landscapes dotted with jagged volcanic peaks, and pristine beaches. This eco-friendly, adults-only oasis (16+) is a haven for sun-soaked days and serenity, perfect for romantic escapes. 

Located near the spectacular Muri Beach, this is the perfect opportunity to practice your snorkelling and diving skills with breathtaking coral reefs and exhilarating marine life. Explore the lush forests and volcanic peaks if you’re feeling adventurous, or browse the nearby local markets in search of hidden treasures.

Enhance your stay with the indulgent offerings of the new Essential Spa, where rejuvenating treatments and massages await, inspired by the natural beauty of the Cook Islands. In the evenings, unwind at the resort’s sophisticated cocktail bar, offering a curated menu of signature drinks and refreshing tropical concoctions to enjoy as the sun dips below the horizon.

Dive into the resort’s expansive saltwater lagoon pool, complete with a living coral reef (the only one of its kind on Rarotonga). Relax on your private balcony or step straight onto the beach from the resort and wander along the sandy shores to watch the sun rise or set over the ocean. If you’re lucky, you may even catch whales migrating just a short distance from the beach at certain times of the year.
offer_address: 1 Ara Tapu, Turangi Village, Arong District, Rarotonga, 3385, Cook Islands

vendor_name: Te Manava Luxury Villas and Spa
title: Cook Islands Five-Star Pool Villa Paradise
description:
From sapphire waters and white-sand beaches to lush rainforests dotted with towering volcanic peaks, the Cook Islands are an idyllic paradise - and a heavenly stay at the five-star Te Manava Luxury Villas & Spa, Rarotonga, might just be the escape of your dreams.

Superbly located right on stunning Muri Beach, overlooking the tropical islet of Taakoka, Te Manava Luxury Villas & Spa lends itself to lazy days spent sunbathing and kayaking. The boutique collection of 13 luxurious, self-contained villas offers one-, two- and three-bedroom options, with plenty of space for couples to indulge in a romantic stay, families to spend quality time together or groups of friends to seek a South Pacific adventure. Before you know it, you’ll be sipping cocktails by your villa's private pool, enjoying treatments at the spa, hiking your way through the verdant trails that weave across the island, kayaking across the crystal-clear lagoon or exploring below the surface among the Cook Islands' vibrant reefs. A complimentary pick-up and drop-off service is available to take guests to the facilities at sister hotel Pacific Resort Rarotonga, where you'll find one kids' and one lagoon-style swimming pool, a restaurant and bar.
offer_address: Ara Tapu, Ngatangiia District, Cook Islands

title: Beachfront Rarotonga Retreat on Secluded West Coast with Three Restaurants, Bar & Spa
description:
Escape to island paradise at this idyllic retreat located on the stunning white sands of Rarotonga's west coast. When you're not lounging by the resort's sparkling pool, take a leisurely stroll along the beach or explore the vibrant local markets brimming with artisan crafts and fresh produce.

Indulge your tastebuds at one of the resort's three onsite restaurants, where you can savour a variety of local Polynesian and international cuisine. Head to Mal's Bar for a refreshing cocktail as you watch the sun sparkle on the azure lagoon or, retreat to the spa before exploring the island's lush rainforests and ancient marae (sacred sites).
offer_address: 1 Puaikura Drive, Arorangi, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Cook Islands Five-Star Private Pool Villas
description: Embrace the splendour of the South Pacific with a romantic escape at the five-star Rumours Luxury Villas & Spa. Set in a beautiful beachfront location, just steps from the gorgeous white sands of Muri Beach and its crystal-clear lagoon, this luxurious resort boasts everything you need for a dreamlike escape from reality, from beautifully designed villas complete with private pools and gardens to the award-winning Waterfall Spa and tropical marine life in the glistening lagoon.
offer_address: Main Road, Muri Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: South Pacific's First Adults-Only Art Resort with Direct Beach Access & Complimentary Electric Bicycles
description: Trade in the bustle of daily life for long, blissful days on an island paradise at the adults-only Motu Beachfront Art Villas. Here, your only duty is to disconnect from the rest of the world and enjoy soul-stirring Pacific artwork that's peppered across the resort. With only 10 luxury villas onsite, enjoy a secluded and intimate escape - relax by the pool with an ice-cold beer in hand, or paddle out to the crystal-clear lagoon to snorkel or kayak.
offer_address: Ara Tapu, Takitumu District, Cook Islands

title: Cook Island Sunset Coast Beachfront Retreat
description:
Spend days lazing on sugar-white beaches or floating in a turquoise lagoon at Crown Beach Resort & Spa, a spectacular resort stretched across Raratonga's sunset coast. Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide by Tripadvisor, this sun-soaked beachfront escape is set within five acres of gardens with everything you could need for an indulgent island retreat.

Treat yourself to a pampering treatment at the Spa Ariki, hire kayaks and snorkelling equipment and hit the ocean or lagoon for a fun-filled afternoon, rent a bicycle and explore the island, take a dip in the waterfall swimming pool, and enjoy the convenience of a supermarket, general store, bakery and liquor store just across the road. When hunger strikes, pull up a chair at Ocean's Restaurant, a waterfront venue serving up fresh local seafood, or opt for succulent meat cuts and local fish char-grilled to perfection at Flambe. At the outdoor bar, order a cocktail or a flute of bubbly and watch a spectacular sunset dip below the horizon.
offer_address: Arorangi Sunset Coast Beach Road Rarotonga, Cook Islands

title: Five-Star Adults-Only Cook Islands Private Pool Villa
description:
Embrace the splendour of the South Pacific with a romantic adults-only escape at the five-star Rumours Luxury Villas & Spa (guests under 15 years of age are not permitted). Set in a beautiful beachfront location, just steps from the gorgeous white sands of Muri Beach and its crystal-clear lagoon, this luxurious resort - stamped with a prestigious Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2020 award- is what dreams are made of.

Built with privacy and romance in mind, this luxurious property boasts everything you need for a dreamlike escape from reality, from beautifully designed villas complete with private pools and waterfalls to an award-winning waterfall spa and tropical marine life in the glistening lagoon. You’ll be totally spoilt at this idyllic Rarotonga retreat blessed with stunning coral reef, spectacular sunsets and lush mountainous rainforest.
offer_address: Ara Tapu, Ngatangiia District, Cook Islands

title: Cook Islands Private Pool Villa Haven Overlooking Rarotonga's Muri Lagoon
description: Experience the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the Nautilus Resort, ideally positioned on Rarotonga's gorgeous white sands overlooking the crystal-clear waters of Muri Lagoon. Fall into the groove of island time and escape the rigors of the everyday at this boutique haven with just 17 freestanding, Polynesian-style eco-friendly luxury Ares (villas), each with their own private plunge pool. Thanks to an array of water activities, you can explore the colourful reefs with ease and enjoy a world of underwater adventures every day. When you are ready to further indulge, Nautilus Restaurant offers award-winning beachfront fare and tempting cocktails, while Spa Nautilus offers rejuvenating body treatments sure to make your stay one to remember.
offer_address: CK, Ara Tapu, Ngatangiia District, Cook Islands
